## async.PMapOptions interface

并发映射选项接口，配置映射的并发行为

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PMapOptions 
```

## Remarks

版本: 1.0.0

## Example


```typescript
// 限制最多5个并发请求
const options: PMapOptions = {
  concurrency: 5
};
```
